content: Vangelis Markakis Vangelis Markakis Associate Professor, Department of Informatics, Athens University of Economics and Business (AUEB) Home Research group & activities Publications Working Papers Conference Publications Journal Publications Book Chapters - Surveys Theses Other Teaching Curriculum Vitae For students Contact Information: Athens University of Economics and Business Department of Informatics Patision 76, 10434 Athens, Greece Office hours: To be announced in the Fall semester, Antoniadoy wing, 4th floor Phone: +30-210-8203-149 Email: last name AT gmail dot com Welcome to my webpage! I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Informatics and a member of the Theory Group. My interests lie in theoretical computer science as well as on algorithmic aspects of game theory, auctions and mechanism design. For more information regarding my work, my students and other activities, please follow the "Research group" and the "publications" tab.
